thread.title: Dream Global REIT May 2018 Monthly Distribution

author: cnbc.com
title: Dream Global REIT May 2018 Monthly Distribution
text:
TORONTO, May 22, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- DREAM GLOBAL REIT (TSX:DRG.UN) (FRA:DRG) today announced its May 2018 monthly distribution in the amount of 6.667 cents per unit (80 cents annualized). The May distribution will be payable on June 15, 2018 to unitholders of record as at May 31, 2018.
Dream Global REIT is an unincorporated, open-ended real estate investment trust that provides investors with the opportunity to invest in commercial real estate exclusively outside of Canada. Dream Global REITâ€™s portfolio currently consists of approximately 19.5 million square feet of gross leasable area of office, industrial and mixed-use properties across Germany, the Netherlands, Austria and Belgium. For more information, please visit www.dreamglobalreit.ca .
For further information, please contact:
P. Jane Gavan Tamara Lawson President and Chief Executive Officer Chief Financial Officer (416) 365-6572 (416) 365-6560 jgavan@dream.ca tlawson@dream.ca
Source: Dream Global REIT
